title: Lag Spikes Unknown Causes
body: During the recent Yorick Rework Update I have been recieving lag spikes that I had not experienced before. I tried changing the dns, firewall, and shutting down my router but to no avail. My internet speed is fine butvwhen I'm in a match randomly during the match I encounter the lag spikes, pings reaching to the 1000s. I would also like to know if anyone else has encountered this problem as well.

replies.body: Even if your internet is fine, your network can have a problem specifically maintaining a connection to the game server.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches to find out what's going wrong.  The results will also give you some troubleshooting steps to help out.  Let me know if you have any questions!
